/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtCdBDao.selectPtCdB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.CLS_CD, T.CD, T.CD_VA, T.RESC_ID, T.COMP_IDS, T.REF_VA1, T.REF_VA2, T.CD_DESC, T.SORT_ORDR, T.USE_YN, T.FLD_YN, T.SYS_CD_YN, T.REGR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM PT_CD_B T
AND T.CLS_CD = #{clsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.CD = #{cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.REF_VA1 = #{refVa1, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND T.REF_VA2 = #{refVa2, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.FLD_YN = #{fldYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.CLS_CD, T.CD
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
